stats.totalIncomeTooltip: Total revenue received from sports venue and pitch bookings
stats.totalExpenseTooltip: Total amount paid out to venue and pitch owners
stats.netBalanceTooltip: Platform net profit (Total Income - Payouts to Venue Owners)

charts.monthlyRevenueDescription: Detailed view of monthly revenue collected from sports venue and pitch bookings throughout the year
charts.monthlyTransfersDescription: Total amount transferred monthly to venue and pitch owners as payment for bookings received
